reviews.title: great hotel
reviews.text: Great hotel right in the heart iof the gothic quarter and accross from the cathedral. I had a birthday there and having champange on the roof top in the jacuzzi was fab! Staff are very friendly and helpful with information regarding transport etc. Rooms are modern and clean.

reviews.title: some noise!!
reviews.text: Still here going home tomorrow after 3 nights, i feel my bed is in the middle of the street, it´s now 1.30 am and the noise of the traffic on the street is unbelievable!!.

reviews.title: Small but perfectly formed
reviews.text: However the location is good and breakfast provides plenty of choice so it compensates a little. Rooftop is a sight to behold especially if the sun is shining!

reviews.title: just the job!
reviews.text: Bar is closed at 12 so if you go out for dinner look elsewhere for a nightcap or else use the mini bar.

reviews.title: Amazing Hotel, Perfect Location
reviews.text: If you plan to stay here bring earplugs or look for a room at the back of the hotel

Stayed at the hotel for a short city break. Staff were polite and helpful. The breakfast has a large selection and includes English Breakfast not just cold meat as is often the case in European Hotels. The rooms are on the small side but are adequate and the bathrooms are spacious, modern and clean. The location of the hotel is great especially for those wanting to stay close the the sights but on a quieter road than the Ramblas.
reviews.title: Great Location, Nice Hotel,Great City
Good location to explore.
reviews.text: Ideal location for exploring the city, 15 mins walk from the main square. The hotel, bedrooms and bathrooms were very clean. and the staff friendly. Excellent breakfast with a great selection. Yes the bedroom was small and there was little natural light as the window looked out onto an internal courtyard. The airconditioning was also a bit dodgy, but for a short break at this time of the year was quite acceptable. Would not have been satisfactory in the summer.
Roof top jacuzzi and gym were free.
reviews.title: Fantastic Location

reviews.text: Would recommend for a short break but shop around to get a good deal.
reviews.title: Over rated, Unhelpful & Not worth the Money

reviews.text: This Hotel in on the edge of the Gothic Quarter and walking distance from pretty much everywhere. We could not have chosen a better location. I´ve just read a few reviews from others and was really shocked at what I read. Yeah ok, the rooms are small but not small enough to complain about. The bathrooms are really spacious and clean with a great shower.... The staff are more than helpful and we even ate at the hotel one evening, food was great and recommended some really good places to visit. If you like cocktails there is a place called "Dry Martini"...
reviews.title: Over-rated

reviews.text: Just returned after a 4 day break in barcelona.
reviews.title: Hotel was ok, location was great

reviews.text: Hotel was nice but with one or 2 complaints.
reviews.title: Barcelona wondeful but.....

reviews.text: Room size was fine - not a big room but nothing to complain about, bathroom was really nice.
reviews.title: Great Location
Great hotel in a perfect location
reviews.text: The biggest problem we has is that we were on the first floor at the front of the hotel - weekdays the noise was not to bad but at the weekend it was impossible to sleep because of the noise from the street so if you are not staying out until 5 try and get a room higher up or at the back of the hotel.

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.text: We had booked the mondcada pleasure offer which includes access to the jacuzzi on the roof with the cava reception. The jacuzzi was closed - did not really mind but thought we should have been informed of this before we arrived as it did influence picking the hotel. Champagne was not forthcoming either.

reviews.title: Good location, but small room!
reviews.text: I stayed here last year and thought it was OK, nothing special, but did the job.

reviews.title: Excellent hotel !
reviews.text: The staff at reception were a bit surly and did a quick check-in and sent me off to my room..

reviews.title: Smallest Hotel Room Ever!!!!!
reviews.text: The room was probably one of the smallest I have stayed in, however, I was traveling alone, so thie wasn't much of a problem.

reviews.title: Nice hotel but alot of street noise
reviews.text: The bathroom was a good size, tub with over head shower.

reviews.title: Great Location
reviews.text: For me the location is the best feature of this hotel, you are near a few of the tourist attractions, just a short walk to the harbour and lots of restaurants and bars around.

What is it with the size of rooms??!! We slept in the comfortable bed, showered in the wonderful bathroom and dressed in the clean and well maintained room... we didn't play 5 aside!! If you are going to spend all day in the room... it ain't big enough! Pefect location with wonderful views from the rooftop. A busy road but no noise... Breakfast was superb, the widest choice I've seen (Turin, Porto in the last 12 months) and was of excellent quality. If you're lured by the hottub check it can be used... not sure if it was time of year or weather, but never saw it in use. We arrived at 1:30 am the receptionist was efficient but there was nobody to carry our bags! When we left they stored our bags till later in the day and were very helpful in general. In between then we had no cause to use the reception. As for Barcelona... wonderful, we did the bus touristic (recommend) but could walk to all the tapas bars and shops you'll ever need!
reviews.title: Excellent Weekend Break
Would certainly go again, not as bad as people make it out to be.
reviews.text: I found this hotel a lot better than I was expecting, I was a bit worried by some of the reviews but I found this hotel to be really nice.

reviews.title: Good Location
reviews.text: Bags were collected as soon as we got out of the taxi and drinks offered at reception this was a nice touch and made you feel extra special.

reviews.title: Stay away
reviews.text: We were shown to our room and I found the staff to be very helpful, the rooms were very clean and although perhaps a bit small nothing major, we had plenty of room to move and put our suitcase, what you have to remember is this hotel is very close to everything we wanted to see so I feel we had to compensate on the size of the room a little, we walked to most places and even took the bus tour to see Camp Nou this was amazing!!
The breakfast is the best I have ever seen and for what we paid this in itself was well worth it, it was lovely and really set us up for the day.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for a long weekend

reviews.text: stayed in this hotel 1901/08 for 3 nites, the hotel was great the staff were excellent, couldnt have done enough for us,
reviews.title: Great Hotel & Location

likes.liked: — location & the staff couldnt be more helpful

reviews.text: on arrival we received a complimentry glass of cava which was lovely! our rooms were on the 3rd floor our room was bigger than our friends but only because it had wheel chair excess , the bathroom was great and a bonus was the hotel left , free toothbrushes, mini shavin kits, shoe shine kits, sewing kits, shampoo rtc, even cologne! the rooms have a mini bar and wasnt over priced like some hotels, for example a small bottle of cava was only 4.60 euros which was good and a bottle of water was 1.85 euros,
reviews.title: Great central location, but Tiny rooms with rock-like beds

likes.disliked: — Tiny rooms, rock-like beds, poor food.

reviews.text: the hotel has a restaurant we didnt eat in it but the menus displayed seemed good and good price, we did eat breakfast on the last day and they even gave us a half price voucher so for 2 of us it was 8.99 euros, which was brillant.
reviews.title: 'Fantastic Hotel'

likes.liked: — Superb service from staff excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: overall the hotel was great and they had a roof top sun bathing area and bar with a jacuzzi we couldnt use it as it would of been a bit cold, but the views were amazing!!!! cant rate the hotel enough we check reviews of hotels when we go away, so we know how important it is to read up so hope this helps , also theres a cofffee bar across the road form the hotel which is great for baquettes, crossiant, pastries, lattes coffees etc, it was lovely.
reviews.title: Great Location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My 2nd trip to Barcelona in so many weeks for business, the oddly named H10 hotel was right in the heart of the town centre. The front desk staff were extremely helpful and polite overall. But that's about all the pluses. The room was literally the size of a large-ish walk-in closet and minute interior window. When asked for a larger room, at first I was told nothing was available, but when pushed, the staff escorted me to a slightly larger room with a double bed. At least in this room, you could turn around and have space to put your suitcase. However, the bed was hard as a rock (even for someone who prefers a firm mattress this was a bit too granite-like), also there no space to work as there was no desk, no chairs - nothing but a bed, and a small mini-bar wedged into the corner by the bed. Breakfast was sad and lacklustre, with no English papers available (I was told they would come in around noon.) So if you don't mind the lack of comfort and amenties, and just want to stay in hub of the hustle and bustle of Barcelona - it's an ok place to stay. Otherwise, proabably best to try another hotel.
reviews.title: brilliant hotel location etc
great hotel, great location
reviews.text: Stayed in H10 Montcada for 6 nights. The room was of a good size for a twin room. The staff on reception were very friendly and always smiling. The room was very clean. The breakfast was excellent. The safe in the bedroom came in very handy and you could set your own code. The room also had a mini-bar.

reviews.title: Wonderful hotel
reviews.text: The hotel is in an ideal location, only a short walk to Las Ramblas and the beach. And then there was the Bank Holiday Festival !!!! It was fantastic - the atmoshpere was great.

reviews.title: Best European hotel I have stayed in
reviews.text: If i was to go back to Barcelona again I would most definately stay in this hotel.
We were in Barcelona Hotel Montcada for 4 days/nights and everything was fantastic from the service to the food to the hotel roof!!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Booked this hotel for our honeymoon and we were not disappointed. The hotel was very clean and perfectly located to see Barcelona. Staff helpful, breakfasts lovely and bar prices reasonable.
reviews.title: Room was expensive AND tiny.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel H10 Montcada was in a perfect location, less than five minute walk from Las Rambles (straight up the little side street across from the hotel). We arrived at 11am so we were a little early for the free glass of bubbly, we were told to ask for it later, but we didnt bother, nice idea though.
reviews.title: deadly spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was an little small, but we didnt paln on spending our holiday in it, so we didnt mind. Nice clean facilities, well stocked mini bar and loads of soap, shampoo, sewing kit..etc..
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The roof top terrace was nice, great views of the city, but a little cold for a dip in the jacuzzi (early dec).
reviews.title: Great Barcelona Base

likes.liked: — Central location and friendly efficient staff.
likes.disliked: — Small room and flat uncomfortable pillows.

reviews.title: Fantastic location
reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was excellent, great variety and choice.

My only fault is when ordering tea in the bar, Tea for one consisted of a pot of tea, tea for two a night later (from the same waiter) also consisted of the same size pot of tea but twice the price. I should have said something, but we were tired and just wanted to sit down and drink the tea so I let it go, other than that its a good spot, i would definetly go back there again.
reviews.title: SUPERB EXPERIENCE IN BARCELONA

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the H10 Montcada hotel for 4 nights and had a great time!
reviews.title: wonderfull hotel at an excellent location

likes.disliked: — The room was a bit small

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very close to the Metro station, and the turistic bus and is right on the corner of the Gothic Bari and the Born.
reviews.title: Great Location, fabulous rooftop terrace/jacuzzi

likes.disliked: — The view of a wall from our room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a wonderfull time there andthe stuff was great and very helpfull. the room was small, but it really didn't bother us at all, as there was enough room for all that was needed.
reviews.title: loved Gaudi

reviews.text: The bathroom was wide, clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: H10 Montcada - a fabulous stay

reviews.text: At night there are a lot of pubs and resturants near by.
reviews.title: Nice hotel - EXCELLENT location
Roof Top Terrace - FANTASTIC HOTEL
reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel twice and recommended it to others.

Stayed once with a Hen Party and the other with Mum and Autie - both times had a lovely room - small but don't really need much room as not in there much and we did have a third bed put in the room so that wan't of helped!
reviews.title: Great Hotel, and location perfect!
Fantastic Hotel!!
reviews.text: The glass of Cava on arrival is a great touch and so is the roof terrace and jaccuzzi up there. The Sun loungers, tables and chairs up there make it a great place to sun bath and have a drink and it s a fantastic view of the city.

reviews.title: Excellent city centre hotel
reviews.text: The location is good too its on the tourist bus route and is in easy walking distance of the Harbour and La Rambles (is that how you spell it?) and the main shopping area.

reviews.title: Great hotel in central location!
reviews.text: We have just arrived back from a two night stay at this hotel, and i can say that it is a lovely hotel in a great location! I was a little concerned from some of the reviews that I read prior to our visit but we were not dissapointed at all. On our arrival, we were greeted by very friendly reception staff who explained all the hotel facilities and talked us through the high lights of Barcelona whilsdt relating to a map which was provided. We then went to our room which was on floor6. The view from our room was nothing special, but we were not here to spend time in the room! The rooms are small and as a previous review suggested: there is no room to swing a cat! (who wants to do this anyway!) But this was not a problem, what do you need lots of room for? The room was clean and modern with a lovely bathroom. the only down side was no bath but there was a large shower. I believe that some rooms do have baths though, so if you request one then you should get one! We were not too fussed about this anyway as we spent both nights in the roof top jacuzzi in the early evening. I would say that this is what makes the hotel that little bit extra special! The roof terrace was lovely and I can imagine that in the summer months this would be a lovely place to enjoy the sun lougers and bar. We were also given our champagne which was included whilst sat in the jacuzzi which was a nice touch! overall I would definatly recommend this hotel, as it is centrally located and amongst many bars and restaurants. we did not use any transport whilst in Barcelona and saw most of it on foot. We also did not have any problems with noise whilst staying at this hotel. I was concerned about the bed on arrival as they are very hard, but I have to say I had two very good nights sleep.
We arrived to a glass of cava too! The best bit to the hotel....... The roof terrace with a jacuzzi was an added bonus too.
reviews.title: Smal!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were on a hen weekend in Barcelona and reserved 3 rooms months prior to our visit, we requested 3 no smoking rooms. On arrival, after our glass of cava, we were disappointed to find that we had 3 tiny smoking rooms. On complaint to the reception, they were very unhelpful, said you could only reqest a none smoking room and as they were fully booked, could offer few alternatives.
reviews.title: Excellent location, good value

reviews.text: The rooms were very small, not enough room to swing a cat (not that you swing many cats on holiday in Spain). The air conditioning did not work, the rooms were noisy if on the front of the hotel and the reception did not speak much english, which caused problems.
reviews.title: A good quality and central hotel for the Tourista Bus

likes.liked: — It was central for our needs

reviews.text: Breakfast was average, do not have the cooked breakfast or eggs!
reviews.title: If you have another option, do not choose this hotel

reviews.text: Ensure if the sun is out, you make use of the fabulous roof terrace.
reviews.title: Top floor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a 2 day stay at this hotel and it was great. excellent location and excellent service. i was a bit worried having read the reviews on here saying the rooms weren't great. but the room we had was lovely, wooden floors, marble bathroom. i can't really understand what other reviewers are talking about unless the rooms differ significantly' we were in room 605. the hotel is really central so you can walk to everything. i'd definitely stay here again
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this Hotel 3 years before and so returned because we had enjoyed it. This time however we were so disappointed. We had booked this 6 months before, I e-mailed with time of arrival - no response! On arrival the reception staff were ages sorting out the room, laughing and joking together at which point I decided to listen! Big mistake as I do speak Spanish. Much of the discussion appeared to be about the size of the bed but I didn't say anything until we were taken to the room - 211. It was tiny and stunk of smoke even though I had requested non-smoking. Window could not be opened. Small bed with only just enough room to walk by if you edged up the side of the wall. Simply awful. Straight down to reception to be told they were full! Told them I am asthmatic at which point they then offered another room which had not been made- up. Went to see it - marginally better rather like a cell! After creating yet again, speaking in spanish so they knew I understood their earlier conversation, they said they would move us the next day if we would stay in the 2nd room offered for one night.
reviews.title: Avoid room 211 - broom cupboard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The next day we stayed in room 502 - much better with nice bathroom in which we could open the large window. Even though it was not that big it was very pleasant and had we have checked into this room the first day we would have unpacked and started our holiday very happily.
reviews.title: Great location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you look at the floor plans, the same for each floor, you can see the same tiny rooms run throughout the hotel in the same position. They are not big enough for one person even and feel very claustrophobic , being internal rooms with no opening windows.
reviews.title: Best service ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The people who have enjoyed this Hotel are quite right, it is in a great position, and I too don't need to spend long in the room, but if they had been given the rooms we were first offered they would give the same review. It's not even cheap at over £110 a night with no breakfast!
reviews.title: Montcada and Barri Gotic

likes.liked: — the friendliness and helpfullness of the staff.
